title: Vegetable Patties

ingredients.content: 3 ½ oz celery, in pieces (1 in.)

preparations.content: Place cucumber, yogurt, lemon juice and salt into mixing bowl and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl and refrigerate until ready to serve. Clean mixing bowl.
Place garbanzo beans, curry powder, turmeric, cilantro, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and grind <b>20 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onion, carrots and celery into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add reserved garbanzo flour, eggs, water, peas and corn into mixing bowl and mix <b>5 sec//speed 5<b>.

Place a large frying pan over med-high heat. Add ¼ inch of oil into bottom of pan. Divide batter into 6 portions and press into a patties (see Tip). Once oil is hot, add patties being careful not to overcrowd the pan. Cook for 3-5 minutes per side, until golden brown. Repeat with remaining patties.
Serve with mixed greens, Cucumber Yogurt Sauce and garnish with paprika.

hintsAndTricks: Press patties between two small plates or use a hamburger press.
For a spicier version, add 1 tsp chili flakes while grinding garbanzo beans.
